    #include <iostream>
    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <vector>
    #include <map>
    #include <algorithm>
     
     
    using namespace std;
    bool compare(const pair<long long int, long long int>& firstElem, const pair<long long int, long long int>& secondElem) {
    if(firstElem.first==secondElem.first){
    return firstElem.second<secondElem.second;
    }
    return firstElem.first<secondElem.first;
     
    }
     
     
    int main() {
    int cases;
    scanf("%d",&cases);
    for(int i=0;i<cases;i++)
    {
    int n,q;
    //int arr[10000000000]={ 0 };
    vector<pair<long long int,long long int> > arr;
    //map<long long int,int> myMap;
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&q);
    for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    {
    long long int ts,te;
    scanf("%lld %lld",&ts,&te);
    pair<long long int,long long int> temp;
    temp.first = ts;
    temp.second = te;
    //for(long long int k=ts;k<te;k++)
    arr.push_back(temp);
    }
    sort(arr.begin(),arr.end(),compare);
    for(int l=0;l<q;l++)
    {
    long long int qi;
    scanf("%lld" , &qi);
    int k=0;
    int a =0;
    while(arr[k].first <= qi && k<arr.size())
    {
    	if(arr[k].first <= qi && arr[k].second >= qi) {a=1;break;}
    	k++;
    }
    if(a==1) cout << "NO" << endl;
    else cout << "YES" << endl;
    }
    }
    // your code goes here
    return 0;
    }
